docs.lead_paragraph: In a deal that threatens WebMD's dominance in the health care space, Revolution Health Network announced Friday that it has merged with Waterfront Media, a publisher that owns several health Web sites, The New York Times's Stephanie Clifford reported.

headline.main: Steve Case Merges His Health Site With Rival

docs.abstract: In a deal that threatens WebMD's dominance in the health care space, Revolution Health Network announced Friday that it has merged with Waterfront Media, a publisher that owns several health Web sites, The New York Times's Stephanie Clifford reported. The deal, valued at $300 million, would give the combined companies enough traffic in the United [...]
